about_the_game:
Content of the Steam Game Festival: Autumn 2020 demo

  • The first 3 worlds of the campaign, solo or co-op
  • 1v1 or 2v2 online (round 1 of the Online Adventure Mode)
  • 1v1 or 2v2 offline (2 stages)

PLEASE NOTE:
Enabling online multiplayer at this stage of development is an experiment. I do this, because as a solo dev it's hard to test online features at a bigger scale. The Steam Game Festival gives me a chance to test the online features with a larger user base.

PLEASE EXPECT THINGS TO BE NOT POLISHED AND/OR NOT WORKING :)

Campaign

Play the first 3 worlds of the unfinished game solo or co-op!

Online Adventure Mode

In the full version of Aloof the Online Adventure Mode consists of matches against online opponents with the same amount of wins as you. Win, and go to the next round! But lose, start over from round 1. Win 3 times in a row to beat the Online Adventure!

In this demo, players stay in round 1 of the Online Adventure Mode.

Couch Versus Couch

Play 2 multiplayer stages against you friend IRL (with respect for social distancing, of course).

short_description: I am very excited and scared to show you this demo with (unfinished and untested) online multiplayer! Aloof is a puzzle battler, like Puyo Puyo Tetris, but plays completely different. In the world of Aloof you summon and defend small islands all the while you build combos against your opponent.
